PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

allowActivityContinuation.description: If set to false, Handoff will be disabled.

allowAddingGameCenterFriends.description: Allow the user to add Friends on Game Center

allowAirDrop.description: Disable AirDrop if set to false

allowAppCellularDataModification.description: Allow modifying cellular data usage for apps settings

allowAppInstallation.description: Allow only a connected Mac host to install applications

allowAppRemoval.description: Allow the user to remove apps (Supervised only)

allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.description: When false, prevents Siri from querying user-generated content from the web.

allowAssistantWhileLocked.description: Allow Siri while device is locked

allowAutoUnlock.description: If set to false, disallows macOS auto unlock. Defaults to true.

allowAutomaticAppDownloads.description: If set to false, prevents automatic downloading of apps purchased on other devices. Does not affect updates to existing apps. Defaults to true

allowBookstore.description: Supervised only. If set to false, iBookstore will be disabled.

allowBookstoreErotica.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user will not be able to download media from the iBookstore that is tagged as erotica.

allowCamera.description: Allow the user to use the camera

allowCloudAddressBook.description: Allow macOS iCloud Address Book Services

allowCloudBTMM.description: Allow iCloud Back to my Mac

allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.description: If set to false, disallows macOS cloud desktop and document services. Defaults to true.

allowCloudDocumentSync.description: Allow document syncing with iCloud. When false, disables document and key-value syncing to iCloud.

allowCloudPhotoLibrary.description: Allow iCloud Photo Library to be used on the device

allowDiagnosticSubmission.description: Send diagnostic and usage reports to Apple

allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.description: If set to false, the diagnostic submission and app analytics settings in the Diagnostics & Usage pane in Settings cannot be modified

allowEnterpriseAppTrust.description: If set to false removes the Trust Enterprise Developer button in Settings->General->Profiles Device Management, preventing apps from being provisioned by universal provisioning profiles. This restriction applies to free developer accounts but it does not apply to enterprise app developers who are trusted because their apps were pushed via MDM, nor does it revoke previously granted trust. Defaults to true.

allowEnterpriseBookBackup.description: Allow enterprise books to be backed up

allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync.description: Allow enterprise books notes and highlights to be synced

allowEraseContentAndSettings.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user cannot choose the option "Erase All Content and Settings" in Settings > General > Reset

allowExplicitContent.description: Allow user access of explicit content

allowFindMyFriendsModification.description: If set to false, changes to Find My Friends are disabled.

allowFingerprintForUnlock.description: Allow Touch ID to Unlock Device

allowHostPairing.description: If set to false, host pairing is disabled with the exception of the supervision host. If no supervision host certificate has been configured, all pairing is disabled. Host pairing lets the administrator control which devices an iOS 7 device can pair with.

allowInAppPurchases.description: Allow the user to make purchases within applications

allowLockScreenControlCenter.description: If false, prevents Control Center from appearing on the Lock screen.

allowLockScreenNotificationsView.description: If set to false, the Notifications view in Notification Center on the lock screen is disabled and users can’t receive notifications when the screen is locked.

allowLockScreenTodayView.description: If set to false, the Today view in Notification Center on the lock screen is disabled.

allowManagedAppsCloudSync.description: Allow iCloud sync for managed apps

allowMusicService.description: If set to false, Apple Music will be disabled in the Music app.

allowNews.description: Allow the user to access and use News

allowOTAPKIUpdates.description: If false, over-the-air PKI updates are disabled. Setting this restriction to false does not disable CRL and OCSP checks. Default is true.

allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged.description: Enable allow open from managed to unmanaged

allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged.description: Enable allow open from unmanaged to managed

allowPairedWatch.description: If set to false, disables pairing with an Apple Watch. Any currently paired Apple Watch is unpaired and erased. Defaults to true.

allowPassbookWhileLocked.description: If set to false, Wallet notifications will not be shown on the lock screen.

allowPasscodeModification.description: If set to false, prevents the device passcode from being added, changed, or removed. Defaults to true. This restriction is ignored by shared iPads.

allowPhotoStream.description: Allow Photo Stream to be used on the device

allowPodcasts.description: If set to false, disables podcasts. Defaults to true.

allowRadioService.description: If set to false, Apple Music Radio is disabled.

allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: Allow Classroom or similar to observe the screen. This key should be nested beneath allowScreenShot as a sub-restriction. If allowScreenShot is set to false, it also prevents the Classroom app from observing remote screens.

allowSafari.description: Allow the user to use Safari

allowScreenShot.description: Allow the user to take screenshots or screen recordings

allowSharedStream.description: If set to false, disabled Shared Stream.

allowSpotlightInternetResults.description: If set to false, search results from the web will not be shown in Spotlight.

allowUIAppInstallation.description: When false, the App Store is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen. However, users may continue to use Host apps (iTunes, Configurator) to install or update their apps.

allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallation.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user is prohibited from installing configuration profiles and certificates interactively.

allowUntrustedTLSPrompt.description: Allow user to accept untrusted TLS certificates

allowVoiceDialing.description: Allow voice dialing while device is locked

allowYouTube.description: When false, the YouTube application is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen.

allowiTunes.description: When false, the iTunes Music Store is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Users cannot preview, purchase, or download content.

autonomousSingleAppModePermittedAppIDs.description: If present, allows apps identified by the bundle IDs listed in the array to autonomously enter Single App Mode.

items.description: App Bundle ID specified will be allowed to enter Single App Mode autonomously.

blacklistedAppBundleIDs.description: If present, prevents bundle IDs listed in the array from being shown or launchable.

forceAirPlayIncomingRequestsPairingPassw.description: If set to true, forces all devices sending AirPlay requests to this device to use a pairing password.

forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPassw.description: If set to true, forces all devices receiving AirPlay requests from this device to use a pairing password.

forceAssistantProfanityFilter.description: Enable Siri Profanity Filter (Supervised devices only)

forceITunesStorePasswordEntry.description: Require the user's iTunes password to be entered for every purchase

forceLimitAdTracking.description: If true, limits ad tracking. Default is false.

ratingRegion.description: Two-character code for the region used to specify ratings

safariAcceptCookies.description: Accept cookies: 0 - Never, 1 - From current website only (iOS 8) or visited sites (pre-iOS 8), 1.5 - From websites I visit, 2 - Always

whitelistedAppBundleIDs.description: If present, allows only bundle IDs listed in the array from being shown or launchable.
